head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ELKIN, BERNICE D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ELKIN, BERNICE D.

block.p: ELKIN-Bernice D. On August 13, 2000. Beloved wife of the late David Elkin. Loving mother of Faith Bobrow and Eileen Gilbert & their husbands, Philip and Jerry. Adored grandmother of Emily, Amanda, Diane, Rachel & David. Loving sister-in-law of Ruth Muss. Bernice Elkin was an extraordinary woman, a true teacher who taught by the examples of righteousness, charity and goodness. She will truly be missed by all of us.
